content:
ðŸ§ª MINIMAL TEST BUILDER - ULTRA SIMPLE DUAL PAGE SYSTEM ðŸ§ª

Create exactly TWO pages separated by:
<!-- WTAF_ADMIN_PAGE_STARTS_HERE -->

PAGE 1 - Simple Form:
- Basic HTML form with name, email, message fields
- Use fetch() to POST to /api/admin/save
- No error handling, no styling, no complexity

PAGE 2 - Simple Admin:
- Use fetch() to GET from /api/admin/load
- Display data in basic table
- No CSV, no fancy features

API CALLS (use exactly these patterns):

For saving (Page 1):
fetch('/api/admin/save', {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
  body: JSON.stringify({ app_id: 'APP_TABLE_ID', submission_data: formData })
})

For loading (Page 2):
fetch('/api/admin/load?app_id=APP_TABLE_ID')

IMPORTANT: Data structure is:
[{ submission_data: { name: "value", email: "value", message: "value" } }]

Access data like this:
submission.submission_data.name
submission.submission_data.email  
submission.submission_data.message

Return complete HTML in ```html blocks. Keep it EXTREMELY simple - no fancy CSS, no error handling, just basic functionality.
